sentences.en: Chip nRF 903 made by Nordic corporation is used as RF wireless transceiver.
sentences.cn: 该卡与计算机具有RS-232 和USB两种接口方式,RF无线收发电路采用Nordic公司的nRF903芯片设计.

sentences.en: Fabric: lace, velvet, silk, brocade, senior wool, Nordic and other valuable fur.
sentences.cn: 面料: 蕾丝, 丝绒, 真丝, 锦缎, 高级毛料 、 北欧的珍贵裘皮等.

sentences.en: Finland along with Iceland is Nordic rather than Scandinavian.
sentences.cn: 芬兰与冰岛是北欧,而不是斯堪的纳维亚.

sentences.en: Had not both countries signed a Nordic mutual - defence pact against financial destabilisation?
sentences.cn: 两国不是已经签订了北欧共同防御条约以抵抗金融动荡么?

sentences.en: He tried to breed master race of Nordic appearance, the Aryan race.
sentences.cn: 他试图孕育北欧的优等民族,雅利安种族.

sentences.en: He was a handsome blond Nordic type.
sentences.cn: 他属于北欧人那种类型，英俊潇洒，金发碧眼。

sentences.en: Nordic - style furniture meets the popular expectations of new enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 北欧风情新家具,众望所归新享受.

sentences.en: Nordic skiing includes cross country racing, ski jumping and the Nordic Combines.
sentences.cn: 北欧滑雪项目包括:越野滑雪 、 跳台滑雪和北欧混合项目.

sentences.en: Schjerfbeck remained little known outside the Nordic world probably because _____.
sentences.cn: Schejerbeck在日耳曼之外的世界少有人知道是因为_____.

sentences.en: The company founded in 2000, Our products areto the Nordic countries.
sentences.cn: 公司成立于2000年,其产品远销北欧各国,如:瑞典 、 意大利、芬兰、冰岛等国皆有我公司的连锁店.

sentences.en: The Holmenkollen skiing winners are considered world Nordic champions.
sentences.cn: 在霍尔门凯伦滑雪赛中的获胜者被看作是世界越野滑雪赛冠军.

sentences.en: The Nordic birches have long been of special interest.
sentences.cn: 北欧的桦树很久以来就特别引人注目.

sentences.en: The Nordic countries have been quick to assert their interest in the development of the Baltic States.
sentences.cn: 北欧诸国很快就表示它们对波罗的海诸国的发展感兴趣。

sentences.en: The Nordic model is in fact facing mixed fortunes in the crisis.
sentences.cn: 实际上,北欧模式在此次危机中的命运可谓喜忧参半.

sentences.en: Tracing water masses with 129 I in the western Nordic Seas in early spring 2002.
sentences.cn: 2002年早春在Nordic海西边用129I跟踪水质.

trans.tran_cn: 北欧人的，日耳曼民族的，斯堪的纳维亚的，北欧式滑雪赛的
trans.tran_en: relating to the northern European countries of Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Iceland, and Finland, or to their people

trans.tran_cn: 北欧人，日耳曼民族，具有北欧日尔曼民族外貌特征的人，[体]北欧两项滑雪
